title: Hershey Falls
description: Jonathan Hershey was still grieving the loss of his family five years after an accident claimed their lives. Deciding to take a break and re-evaluate his life, he takes a trip to the ocean, one of his favorite places to be.Imagine his surprise when a little girl - believing him to be her father - comes up behind him, asking why he deserted her, why he didn't want to see her anymore.Can he ignore this child without an active father in her life or is there something he can do to help her, which might provide a healing balm to his own weary, burdened soul?
author: Norma Budden
